post.body: is super stressed and keeps yelling at Lightroom saying,"What, what is that supposed to mean?!" LOL
happy b-day@bogiethepug!!
That's it! I am going to bed. Work will still be here tomm. Gotta be ready for lots o' meetings then. G'night @rachellacour & @tymiller
Me so tired......
to our couple Wendy and Alex Mize!
Just received the NEWEST addition to Modern Luxury's, The Atlantan Brides and we have a beautiful wedding featured in it! Congrats....
Writing Thank You's to some wonderful clients!
Two meetings DONE! What wonderful couples, I hope it works out for them.
Check out http://www.6offour.net! We have more from the Hindu Wedding. It is AWESOME!
Getting some work done before two client meetings tonight
http://twitpic.com/t45o - Lazy, isn't she? @asiapup
Mission Accomplished! Now on to some more productive things....
Getting ready to go to the Apple to store for NEW 3Gs. Sold our Edge phones and made mucho dinero in the process.
http://twitpic.com/syel - Mmmm smores with friends in the chilly country side
My little baker girl, @KatieTorres, just finished off some Christmas cookies to stoke the Christmas spirit! Yeaa!!
Awake for the 1st service at our church. Then off to the Apple store. iPhone is broke...AGAIN!
Going for a family walk with @KatieTorres and @asiapup. Enjoying this crisp December weather.
You would think everything would be slow right now....nope! Trying to fulfill all the last of the Christmas orders.
http://twitpic.com/scbn - Let the dancing begin!!
At @zarias open house party. Come one come all!!
OI! At the dreaded post office b/c I have no other choice. Long lines GO AWAY!
Listening to the Sound of Music while working on some stuff...
Church sign says: "Good thins come to those who wait". And there are two homeless people sleeping on it's steps. How sad :(
Having breakfast with my honey at the Omni Hotel
Fishing was a success! Between 5 guys we caught 35 trout!
Going fly-fishing with the boys on the 'Hooch. Sounds red neck, huh?
Merry Christmas all!! :)
Well our two beggers looking for a hand out from my dad! http://snipurl.com/93ezw
It is a Peterson, from Ireland. It is a River edition, only 1000 made and it will not be made again for 5 years!
Here is my AWESOME gift from @KatieTorres. http://snipurl.com/93290
My wife is FREAKIN' AWESOME!! She got me a pipe for Christmas! Hopefully I can get a chance to break it in today.
Merry Christmas eve! Saying good bye to good friends and welcoming my dad here to celebrate Christmas!
Mmmmmmm sushi for dinner @ Wasabi!
Ambulance came and is checking her out. Thanks to all my Tweets for all your support!
Helping a old lady that fallen and hit here head :(
While the girls shop the guys decided to..... http://snipurl.com/91gx2
Finishing up all the shopping. No problems finding parking! http://snipurl.com/91f5n
Ready to welcome company, how appropriate for the holiday season!
Due to the cold, we rescheduled our shoot. Now we have the morning to clean and welcome some out-of-town guest!
Finally done with some much needed last minute work before our esession tomorrow in the cold. Brrrrrrrrrrrrr
